price: አብዛኞቻቸውም ጥርጣሬን እንጂ አይከተሉም፡፡ ጥርጣሬ ከእውነት ምንም አያብቃቃም፡፡ አላህ የሚሠሩትን ሁሉ ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
arabic: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā yattabiʿu aktharuhum illā ẓannan inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā yafʿalūna
